meanings.definition: Make forceful or violent efforts to get free of restraint or constriction.
meanings.sent1: The cat struggled to escape from the tight grip of the dog.
meanings.sent2: She struggled to open the jar of pickles.
meanings.sent3: The little bird struggled comically to break free from the paper bag.
meanings.sent4: The fish struggled against the hook, fighting for its freedom.
meanings.sent5: The butterfly struggled in the net, its delicate wings fluttering frantically.

meanings.definition: Have difficulty handling or coping with.
meanings.sent1: He struggled with his math homework, finding it very challenging.
meanings.sent2: She struggled to carry all the heavy grocery bags by herself.
meanings.sent3: The puppy struggled to understand why the ball kept rolling away from him.
meanings.sent4: The student struggled through the difficult test, feeling overwhelmed.
meanings.sent5: The old man struggled to remember where he had left his keys.
